CustomField.description: Type of issues with number e.g. '1.Complaint'
CustomField.formula: IF( Text(Type_of_Issue__c) == "Complaint","1.Complaint", IF( Text(Type_of_Issue__c) == "Commendation","2.Commendation", IF( Text(Type_of_Issue__c) == "Suggestion","3.Suggestion","")))
CustomField.label: Type of Issue
